This page shows a few useful UI components those can be used in your application. Components in this page are implemented as full stack (includes the server side).
Check Metronic theme for more UI components

text.name: ChargeReleaseOptionsHeaderInfo
text.value: Manage charge relesae options and permissions.

text.name: ConfigsHeaderInfo
text.value: Manage OCPP configuration keys and permissions.

text.name: CreateChargepointModelConnector
text.value: Create new charge point model connector

text.name: SelectVendorErrorCode
text.value: Select vendor for the error code

text.name: ParentTagsHeaderInfo
text.value: A Parent Tag is used to group many tags and their access

text.name: ChargepointsHeaderInfo
text.value: Chargepoint overview. Click the Action button to edit!

text.name: front.statement.text1
text.value: You want to make sure your chargepoints are available to users and customers. Spine takes care of this. Dashboards give you and your users the overviews you need to be in control of operations.

text.name: front.statement.text2
text.value: Spine, a cloud based service, will optimise your charging throughput in real time. We measure available capacity and distribute power automatically to individual charge points, including phase selection.

text.name: front.statement.text3
text.value: Let Spine take care of your settlement needs. In addition to Rfid, we support external payment solutions via Spine's API interface. You will always be in full control of billing and current users.

text.name: front.Answer
text.value: Spine, scheduled for commercial release in Q1-18, enables infrastructure managers and owners to easily offer backend services to customers and end users, including settlement and usage overviews. Spine lets you build and design your infrastructure into flexible hierarchies. Combined with fine grained access management, this allows for all kinds of user levels to access Spine safely.

text.name: front.altimg1
text.value: Tell me more about building Topology in Spine!

text.name: front.altimg2
text.value: Tell me more about Spine being Vendor Independent!

text.name: front.altimg3
text.value: Tell me more about Settlement in Spine!

text.name: front.altimg4
text.value: Tell me more about saving money using Spine!

text.name: front.altimg5
text.value: Tell me more about going International in Spine!

text.name: front.altimg6
text.value: Tell me more about Automatic Phase Selection support in Spine!

text.name: front.altimg7
text.value: Tell me more about Peaks in Spine!

text.name: front.altimg8
text.value: Tell me more about OCPP in Spine!

text.name: front.segment.tab1
text.value: Not every vendor of charge points for electric vehicles need to develop their own backend system. Using Spine saves time and money.

text.name: front.segment.tab2
text.value: Focus on the core business, providing solutions and taking care of customers. Let Spine do the rest.

text.name: front.segment.tab3
text.value: We believe that community housing is very important for infrastructure coverage. Many small installations require flexible settlement, like the one offered by Spine.

text.name: front.segment.tab4
text.value: Automotive companies that seek to integrate services will benefit from using Spine.

text.name: front.segment.tab5
text.value: Spine is flexible and a scaleable enough to manage large scale operations, including utility providers.

text.name: front.employee.statement1
text.value: Mikael, heading Spine, says: 'I'm thrilled about our team being part of the change from fossil to electric vehicles. This change is vital for all of us, not only for reducing CO2, but for tail-pipe emissions too.

text.name: front.employee.statement2
text.value: Aftab has been part of team from start and is leading the development work on the Spine platform.

text.name: front.employee.statement3
text.value: Anna is making sure Spine is relevant. She says: “It’s important that we at Spine involve partners in our common goals to improve the foundation for electro mobility. There is a better future and we want to contribute to it.

text.name: front.employee.statement4
text.value: Aitzaz makes sure that the Spine service is secure, fast, scalable, and future proof. Aitzaz also heads the API development.

text.name: front.employee.statement5
text.value: We are looking for a CFO that can lead us through financing and reporting. Maybe you are the person we are looking for? .

text.name: front.step.tag1
text.value: Simulate your infrastructure hierarchy before implementing.

text.name: front.step.tag2
text.value: Implement your hardware and connect it to Spine.

text.name: ResetPermissionsTooltip
text.value: This button immediately resets user specific permission settings and saves changes. The user will only have permissions from assigned roles.

text.name: ThisWebSiteRootAddress_Hint
text.value: It will be used when building links to this web site. It's needed for some tasks like building password reset links. Ex: http://mydomain.com/

text.name: SendPasswordResetLink_Information
text.value: A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.

text.value: Invalid user name or email address

text.name: PasswordResetEmail_SubTitle
text.value: This email is sent you to reset and re-create your password.

text.value: Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this not solves the problem, you can re-try to request a new password reset link.

text.name: UserEmailIsNotConfirmedAndCanNotLogin
text.value: Your email address is not confirmed. Please check your email and click the email confirmation link to activate your account. If you did not receive activation email, click the 'email confirmation' to request a new email.

Write only username for same tenant users,
[tenancyName]\[userName] for other tenant's users

for example:
.\admin -> for host admin
Test\admin -> for test tenant's admin
admin -> for your tenant's admin

text.name: CreateConfig
text.value: View and change default OCPP configuration values that are used to when a new chargepoint model is created.
